abstract: NBA Roundup; NBA referee Bill Kennedy reveals that he is gay in wake of having derogatory term used against him by Sacramento Kings guard Rajon Rondo; basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jarrett Jack scored 15 points for the Nets, who have dropped two in a row at home after winning six of their previous seven.

headline.print_headline: After Rondo’s Slur, Referee Says He Is Proud to Be Gay

snippet: Jarrett Jack scored 15 points for the Nets, who have dropped two in a row at home after winning six of their previous seven.
